info.name: Light Theme for YouTube Music
info.description: A refreshing new look for YouTube Music. I'm currently working on an update for this theme, and it'll be ready soon. My styles are moving to the Userstyles.world platform. You can continue using this style, however it is likely to break in the future as it will no longer be updated. To continue supporting my work and receive future updates, please download this style here. You'll need the Stylus extension, which is free and open-source at the Chrome Web Store. Hope to see you there!
info.additionalInfo: This project's on GitHub! Latest Version: 1.9 Released on: March 7th, 2023 By installing and using this theme, you agree to the End-User License Agreement. More updates are available at Userstyles.world. Release Notes: --Patched style for Google's new button type --Small margin fixes on mood chips --Re-adjusted margins on several pages --Fixed coloring of links on notifications --Fixed coloring of share dialog --Adjusted text casing on updated pages --Removed left-alignment for history button on library page as its been removed --Thanks for your support! Known Issues: --Icons over dynamic content, like videos and album art, sometimes remain black --The video player overlay can misbehave on different screen resolutions --Artist photos are confined to squares on the home page This theme may not be copied and/or redistributed in any way, shape or form, excluding the one copy you obtain from my Userstyles or GitHub page.
